gameplay/mines.title: Mines
gameplay/mines.description: Mines are randomly generated with different sizes and resources distributions.

gameplay/mothership/description.title: Description
gameplay/mothership/description.description: Mothership is a two-stage ship designed to transport humans to another planet.

gameplay/mothership/specifications.title: Specifications
gameplay/mothership/specifications.description: The technical specifications of the ship are shown below:

gameplay/robots.title: Robots
gameplay/robots.description: To gather all the resources, multiple robot types were developed to overcome the environmental obstacles.

gameplay/spaceship/core_module.title: Core Module
gameplay/spaceship/core_module.description: The Spaceship has a modular interior with 32 hubs. Some modules are available initially, while the others are damaged and need to be repaired to be functional.

gameplay/spaceship/description.title: Description
gameplay/spaceship/description.description: Starship is a two-stage ship designed to transport cargo to another planet.

getting_started.title: üöÄ Getting Started
getting_started.description: Play a demo version on mobile

roadmap.description: Roadmap changes may occur due to the development process.

story/arrival.title: Arrival
story/arrival.description: Looking at all the ships traveling to their destinations, you‚Äôll see how well the fleets are organized. The main ship, located in the middle, is the Mothership. It is the commander of the fleets and supervises all the operations. On the outside, organized in concentric circles, are the Starships, which are protecting the commander from space debris.

story/community.title: Community
story/community.description: Collaboration increases the chances of building the equipment on the planet in the designated timeframe.

story/supplies.title: Supplies
story/supplies.description: Great, you purchased your right to mine a designated zone. There are a few more things to do before you extract resources. You‚Äôll need a few robots that have the necessary tools to perform the operations. Build the robots first and you are ready to go.

team.title: üë• Team
team.description: Khyron Realm is being developed by a team of engineers and artists.
